mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sync_catalog (to_user_id, catalog_id, parent_id, user_id, name, type, status) VALUES (#{toUserId}, #{catalogId}, #{parentId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{status})
mapper.delete: DELETE * FROM sync_catalog WHERE id IN (#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT id, catalog_id AS catalogId, parent_id AS parentId, user_id AS userId, name, type FROM sync_catalog WHERE to_user_id = #{userId}
